DOC.brief_summary: Purpose : To evaluate performance several dental adhesive use bond tooth-colored filling teeth 6 year fillings place . Participants : Subjects participate study entitle `` Clinical Evaluation New Total-Etch Self-Etch Dental Adhesives '' ( IRB Study # 07-0673 ) . Procedures ( method ) : Fillings place 6 year ago evaluate direct , visual examination . Close-up intra-oral clinical photograph fill make . An impression filling may obtain . The specific study aim 6-year recall patient treat IRB Study # 07-0673 evaluate filling place accord follow characteristic : Retention ; Color match ; Cavosurface margin discoloration ; Secondary caries ; Anatomic form ; Marginal adaptation and/or integrity ; Post-operative sensitivity .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation Total-Etch Self-Etch Dental Adhesives - 6 Year Recall
DOC.criteria: Subjects participate 2007 study entitle `` Clinical Evaluation New TotalEtch SelfEtch Dental Adhesives '' ( UNC IRB Study # 070673 ) .
